question: Which of the following does notdescribe the field of medical anthropology?

answers.text: It provides a framework for common study and comparison of health and illness between cultures.
It studies how anthropologists construct understandings of health and illness as they appear in diverse cultures.
It studies how societies construct understandings of health and illness including treatments for diverse maladies.
It is the study of cultural healing systems such as shamanism in traditional Indigenous cultures versus medical science in modern medicine.
